name: coc-discord-rpc
description: An awesome coc-extension to get Discord Rich Presence integration with NeoVim.
author: LeonardSSH <leonardssh22@gmail.com> (https://leonard.sh)

rpc.clientId.description: Application ClientId. Change only if you known exactly what you're doing.

rpc.enabled.description: Controls if the Discord Presence should show across all workspaces.

rpc.detailsEditing.description:
Custom string for the details section of the rich presence
	- {null} will be replaced with an empty space
	- {file_name} will be replaced with the current file name
	- {workspace_folder} will be replaced with the current workspace name, if any
	- {current_column} will get replaced with the current column of the current line
	- {current_line} will get replaced with the current line number
	- {total_lines} will get replaced with the total line number
	- {problems} will be replaced with the count of problems (warnings, errors) present in your workspace.

rpc.detailsIdling.description:
Custom string for the details section of the rich presence when idling
	- {null} will be replaced with an empty space.

rpc.lowerDetailsEditing.description:
Custom string for the state section of the rich presence
	- {null} will be replaced with an empty space
	- {file_name} will be replaced with the current file name
	- {workspace_folder} will be replaced with the current workspace name, if any
	- {current_column} will get replaced with the current column of the current line
	- {current_line} will get replaced with the current line number
	- {total_lines} will get replaced with the total line number
	- {problems} will be replaced with the count of problems (warnings, errors) present in your workspace.

rpc.lowerDetailsIdling.description:
Custom string for the state section of the rich presence when idling
	- {null} will be replaced with an empty space.

rpc.largeImage.description:
Custom string for the largeImageText section of the rich presence
	- {lang} will be replaced with the lowercased language ID
	- {Lang} will be replaced with the language ID, first letter being uppercase
	- {LANG} will be replaced with the uppercased language ID.

rpc.largeImageIdle.description: Custom string for the largeImageText section of the rich presence when idling.

rpc.smallImage.description:
Custom string for the smallImageText section of the rich presence
	- {app_name} will get replaced with NeoVim text
	- ${app_version} will be replaced with the installed version of NeoVim.

rpc.showProblems.description: Controls if the RPC should show the count of problems (warnings, errors) present in your workspace.

rpc.problemsText.description:
Custom string of the text displaying the amount of problems in your workspace
	- {count} will be replaced by the respective amount of problems.

rpc.workspaceElapsedTime.description: Controls if the RPC should display elapsed time for a workspace or a single file.

rpc.ignoreWorkspaces.description: List of patterns to match workspace names that should prevent the extension from starting.

rpc.detailsViewing.description:
Custom string for the details section of the rich presence when viewing
	- {null} will be replaced with an empty space
	- {file_name} will be replaced with the current file name
	- {workspace_folder} will be replaced with the current workspace name, if any
	- {current_column} will get replaced with the current column of the current line
	- {current_line} will get replaced with the current line number
	- {total_lines} will get replaced with the total line number
	- {problems} will be replaced with the count of problems (warnings, errors) present in your workspace.

rpc.lowerDetailsViewing.description:
Custom string for the state section of the rich presence when viewing
	- {null} will be replaced with an empty space
	- {file_name} will be replaced with the current file name
	- {workspace_folder} will be replaced with the current workspace name, if any
	- {current_column} will get replaced with the current column of the current line
	- {current_line} will get replaced with the current line number
	- {total_lines} will get replaced with the total line number
	- {problems} will be replaced with the count of problems (warnings, errors) present in your workspace.

rpc.lowerDetailsNotFound.description:
Custom string for the state section of the rich presence when no workspace is found.
- {null} will be replaced with an empty space
	- {current_line} will get replaced with the current line number
	- {total_lines} will get replaced with the total line number.

rpc.checkIdle.description: Whether or not to check if you are still active or idle and react accordingly.

rpc.idleTimeout.description: How long the window should be unfocused (in seconds) to either disable rich presence or display you as idle.

rpc.idleText.description: Custom string of the text displaying if you're idle when hovering over the small icon.

rpc.suppressNotifications.description: Controls if info/warn/error messages are shown to the user.

rpc.buttonEnabled.description: Enable a button on your presence with a link to the Git repository you're working in.

rpc.buttonActiveLabel.description: The label to show on the button when the file you are currently editing is located in a Git repository. Set to null to disable.

rpc.buttonInactiveLabel.description: The label to show on the button when you are not editing a file in a Git repository. Set to null to disable. (Disabled by default)

rpc.buttonInactiveUrl.description: The URL of the button when you are not editing a file in a Git repository. Set to null to disable. (Disabled by default)
